function.name: bag_to_set
function.algorithm: local the_set : set of generic : intype := [ ] ; i : integer ; end_local ; if sizeof ( the_bag ) > 0 then repeat i := 1 to hiindex ( the_bag ) ; the_set := the_set + the_bag [ i ] ; end_repeat ; end_if ; return ( the_set ) ;
